sentences: On Monday, Chair John Ashe presented a revised draft decision and detailed breakdown of costs associated with Protocol activities.
Parties agreed on text that requests the Executive Secretary to provide administrative and financial implications, rather than actual costs, of proposed SBSTA and SBI decisions.

The US said administrative funding should include staff costs and actual positions for the biennium, and requested clarification on the methodology used to allocate costs for operational and preparatory activities associated with the Protocol.
